items.content_html: LiteMini-UI is a collection of free, minimalist UI designs tailored for modern web applications. It includes ready-to-use components like login pages, dashboards, user profiles, and settings pages. Designed to be lightweight and highly customizable, LiteMini-UI helps developers kickstart projects with clean and functional UI elements.
items.title: Saajaadeen/litemini-ui: LiteMini-UI is a collection of free, minimalist UI designs tailored for modern web applications. It includes ready-to-use components like login pages, dashboards, user profiles, and settings pages. Designed to be lightweight and highly customizable, LiteMini-UI helps developers kickstart projects with clean and functional UI elements.

items.content_html: ignite-element is a lightweight library for creating web components with support for multiple state management libraries. It allows developers to integrate Redux, MobX, or XState seamlessly while maintaining flexibility and a consistent API.

items.content_html: The Tode Server is a lightweight Express.js backend built with TypeScript. It processes uploaded package.json files to parse and resolve Node.js dependencies, providing structured data to the client for visualization.
items.title: bayethelungah/Tode-Server: The Tode Server is a lightweight Express.js backend built with TypeScript. It processes uploaded package.json files to parse and resolve Node.js dependencies, providing structured data to the client for visualization.

items.content_html: StockFlow (Reflects the flow of goods in and out of your inventory) is a lightweight desktop application for efficient goods and inventory management. Whether you’re running a small business, managing a warehouse, or simply need to keep track of your stock, StockFlow provides an intuitive interface to handle all your inventory-related tasks.
items.title: DraouM/StockFlow: StockFlow (Reflects the flow of goods in and out of your inventory) is a lightweight desktop application for efficient goods and inventory management. Whether you’re running a small business, managing a warehouse, or simply need to keep track of your stock, StockFlow provides an intuitive interface to handle all your inventory-related tasks.
